title: Caffe Henrietta
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Short walk from the Arlozorov train and bus stations, this cafe is hidden behind trees and is a popular neighborhood cafe. In 2014 added many vegan items to its menu, including breakfast (all day), salads, a sandwich, mains, and a dessert (not on menu, ask for it). Has soymilk for coffee. Laptop-friendly with Wi-Fi. Parking on street or a local lot.
